info.title: AMEF API
info.description: Register voor AMEF gerelateerde publicaties en metadata

tags.name: Model
tags.description: This object represents an entire AMEF collection

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Organizations represent entities that publish or manage catalogs. They can be government agencies, companies, or other institutions. Each organization can have multiple catalogs and is identified by various standardized identifiers like OIN, RSIN, and PKI certificates.

basicAuth.description: Basic authentication using username and password. Not recommended for production use.

oauth2.description: OAuth2 authentication using Nextcloud's authentication server.

Lock.description: Lock information object for concurrent access control. Objects can be locked to prevent concurrent editing, ensuring data integrity in multi-user environments.

user.description: User ID that created the lock

process.description: Optional process name associated with the lock

created.description: Timestamp when the lock was created

expiration.description: Timestamp when the object expires (is autmaticly removed)

deleted.description: When the object was marked as deleted

deletedBy.description: User ID who performed the deletion

retentionPeriod.description: How long to keep the deleted object (in days)

purgeDate.description: When the object will be permanently deleted

uuid.description: Unique universal identifier for globally unique object identification

uri.description: Uniform Resource Identifier for unique addressable location

version.description: Semantic version number to track object versions

schema.description: Schema identifier for data validation reference

textRepresentation.description: Text representation of object for search and display optimization

locked.description: Contains either a lock object or the value null

deleted.description: Contains either a deletion object or the value null

owner.description: Nextcloud user identifier for object ownership

authorization.description: Authorization rules for access control configuration

updated.description: Last modification timestamp for change tracking

folder.description: Storage folder path for file organization

files.description: Array of related files to track associated files

relations.description: Array of related object IDs to track object relationships

errors.description: Array of error messages encounterd during the rendering process of this object
example: Property 'spouse' could not be extended because it does not exist.

id.description: Unique identifier of the file in Nextcloud

downloadUrl.description: Direct download URL for the file

shareUrl.description: URL to access the file via share link

userId.description: ID of the user who owns the file

base64.description: Base64 encoded content of the file

filePath.description: Full path to the file in Nextcloud

created.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when file was first shared

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the audit entry

schema.description: Schema ID of the modified object

register.description: Register ID of the modified object

changed.description: Array of modified fields with old/new values

user.description: ID of the user who made the change

processingActivity.description: The processing activity from the registry

operation.description: The step in the processing task

executor.description: The system or person executing the action

system.description: The system where the action occurred

@self.description: The metadata of the object e.g. owner, created, modified, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the object.

documentation.example: Op basis van het zaaktype routeert de servicebuscomponent de aanvraag naar een Zaakafhandelcomponent (generiek of specifiek).

@self.description: The metadata of the object e.g. owner, created, modified, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the object.

name.example: LV01 BGT basisregistratie en SVB view

documentation.example: Toont de referentiecomponenten ter ondersteuning van applicatieservices voor publieksdiensten

@self.description: The metadata of the object e.g. owner, created, modified, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the object.

name.example: Publiceren en gebruiken van informatie over datadiensten

documentation.example: Dienstenafnemers moeten in online catalogi kunnen opvragen welke diensten, met welke kenmerken, door dienstenaanbieder worden aangeboden. \nOnder andere ontwikkelaars hebben baat bij informatie over beschikbare diensten en de vereisten voor het gebruik van de dienst (bijv. specificatie van een dienst conform de OAS-standaard).

@self.description: The metadata of the object e.g. owner, created, modified, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the object.

xmlns.description: De xmlns van dit GEMMA Model

xsi.description: De xsi van dit GEMMA Model

schemaLocation.description: De schemaLocation van dit GEMMA Model

identifier.description: De identifier van dit GEMMA Model

name.description: De name van dit GEMMA Model

name-lang.description: De name-language van dit GEMMA Model

version.description: De version van dit GEMMA Model

documentation.description: De documentation van dit GEMMA Model
documentation.example: De GEMeentelijk Model Architectuur (GEMMA) bevat een blauwdruk van de gemeente en haar informatievoorziening. De GEMMA kan worden gebruikt als basis voor de projectmodellen

documentation-lang.description: De documentation-language van dit GEMMA Model

properties.description: De properties van dit GEMMA Model

elements.description: De elements van dit GEMMA Model

relationships.description: De relationships van dit GEMMA Model

organizations.description: De organizations van dit GEMMA Model

propertyDefinitions.description: De propertyDefinitions van dit GEMMA Model

views.description: De views van dit GEMMA Model

image.description: URL to the organization's logo or image
